meanings.definition: The state or quality of being suspicious.
meanings.sent1: Her suspiciousness about the new student made her keep an eye on him.
meanings.sent2: His suspiciousness towards strangers often made him avoid crowded places.
meanings.sent3: The cat's suspiciousness towards the vacuum cleaner was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The suspiciousness in the air was so thick you could almost touch it.
meanings.sent5: The suspiciousness in her tone was unmistakable.

meanings.definition: A feeling or attitude of mistrust or doubt.
meanings.sent1: The detective's suspiciousness helped him solve the case.
meanings.sent2: His suspiciousness towards the offer seemed justified in the end.
meanings.sent3: The dog's suspiciousness towards the new toy was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: A cloud of suspiciousness hung over the small town after the incident.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's suspiciousness towards cheating students never wavered.
